pageProps.data:
## Normalization

###### Description

Normalize given data by picked normalization type

###### Params

| Param | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
|**tSrc**|<var>[Tensor](/docs/tensor#Tensor)</var>|Input data|
|**type**|<var>string</var>|normalization type, currently supported ['l2', 'minmax']|
|**parallelReductionLayers**|<var>number</var>|Number of layers for a parallel reduction|
